home.alert: In the information age, the barriers just aren't there, the barriers are self-imposed. If you want to set off and go develop some grand new thing, you don't need millions of dollars of capitalization. You need enough pizza and Diet Coke to stick in your refrigerator, a cheap PC to work on, and the dedication to go through with it. We slept on floors. We waded across rivers.
home.about_me_description: I am Tandre, an enthusiast of game development with years of experience in virtual simulation, digital twin, VR, and MR development. Through this blog, I document my personal journey in game creation, technical growth, and reflections on life. I am available for outsourcing projects related to virtual simulation, digital twin, and independent/commercial games for individuals or companies (I primarily work with Unity development, can assist with front-end and back-end tasks, and have a team capable of handling complete projects).

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am Tandre, U3D development engineer, game development enthusiast, specializing in game development and virtual simulation/digital twin field. With 4+ years of Unity engine development experience, I have led the development of GNSS measurement technology virtual simulation teaching system, Zelang Wind Farm VR training system and other large-scale projects. Proficient in building technical frameworks from scratch, with cross-platform (PC/VR/mobile) development capabilities, familiar with SteamVR, HTC VIVE and other XR device integration. Technology stack covers Unity3D/C# full-cycle development, while mastering React/Next.js modern web development technologies.
